column2: corallivore <- read.csv("../data/traits/Chagos Fish Traits v2.xlsx - Corallivores.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
# filter out corallivores from tile data
summarize(sum= sum(Count)) %>% # sum up all the corallivore species abundance per transect
